description: Validates an entire collection of Project Open Data metadata JSON objects. Agencies produce said collections in the form of Data.json files.
title: Project Open Data Catalog

___@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Catalog for the Catalog
___@type.title: Metadata Context

___describedBy.description: URL for the JSON Schema file that defines the schema used
___describedBy.title: Data Dictionary

___@context.description: URL or JSON object for the JSON-LD Context that defines the schema used
___@context.title: Metadata Context

___@id.description: IRI for the JSON-LD Node Identifier of the Catalog. This should be the URL of the data.json file itself.
___@id.title: Metadata Catalog ID
